client-settings.name: 株式会社アザナ（マリンサポートタイド・残波）

extension-param.param-value: style:#site-translate-header-wrapper{width:100% !important; height:44px; position: fixed; top:0;}#site-translate-header-wrapper p{font-size:10px;line-height: 12px;}#site-translate-message{display:table-cell; height:44px; vertical-align:middle; width:5000px;} .container { margin: 44px 0 0; } .gNav.fixed { top: 44px; } @media screen and (max-width: 768px) { .header__logoAreaWrapper { top: 44px; } .spMenuArea { top: 112px; } }
